00056 
00057 struct module_init_list *initlist = NULL;
00058 struct module_init_list *noinitlist = NULL;
00059 
00060 
00061 void
00062 add_to_init_list(char *module_list)
00063 {
00064     struct module_init_list *newitem, **list;
00065     char           *cp;
00066     char           *st;
00067 
00068     if (module_list == NULL) {
00069         return;
00070     } else {
00071         cp = (char *) module_list;
00072     }
00073 
00074     if (*cp == '-' || *cp == '!') {
00075         cp++;
00076         list = &noinitlist;
00077     } else {
00078         list = &initlist;
00079     }
00080 
00081     cp = strtok_r(cp, ", :", &st);
00082     while (cp) {
00083         newitem = (struct module_init_list *) calloc(1, sizeof(*initlist));
00084         newitem->module_name = strdup(cp);
00085         newitem->next = *list;
00086         *list = newitem;
00087         cp = strtok_r(NULL, ", :", &st);
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 int
00092 should_init(const char *module_name)
00093 {
00094     struct module_init_list *listp;
00095 
00096     /*
00097      * a definitive list takes priority 
00098      */
00099     if (initlist) {
00100         listp = initlist;
00101         while (listp) {
00102             if (strcmp(listp->module_name, module_name) == 0) {
00103                 DEBUGMSGTL(("mib_init", "initializing: %s\n",
00104                             module_name));
00105                 return DO_INITIALIZE;
00106             }
00107             listp = listp->next;
00108         }
00109         DEBUGMSGTL(("mib_init", "skipping:     %s\n", module_name));
00110         return DONT_INITIALIZE;
00111     }
00112 
00113     /*
00114      * initialize it only if not on the bad list (bad module, no bone) 
00115      */
00116     if (noinitlist) {
00117         listp = noinitlist;
00118         while (listp) {
00119             if (strcmp(listp->module_name, module_name) == 0) {
00120                 DEBUGMSGTL(("mib_init", "skipping:     %s\n",
00121                             module_name));
00122                 return DONT_INITIALIZE;
00123             }
00124             listp = listp->next;
00125         }
00126     }
00127     DEBUGMSGTL(("mib_init", "initializing: %s\n", module_name));
00128 
00129     /*
00130      * initialize it 
00131      */
00132     return DO_INITIALIZE;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void
00136 init_mib_modules(void)
00137 {
00138 #ifdef USING_IF_MIB_DATA_ACCESS_INTERFACE_MODULE
00139     netsnmp_access_interface_init();
00140 #endif
00141 #  include "mib_module_inits.h"
00142 }
